title: Can't log in to chat service nor play any game mode.
body:
My client was working fine until yesterday, I played with a friend on my same house, me through wi-fi and he was playing through LAN. We have DONE this in the past and worked and played both together, yesterday we even played one and after we started another game, the game crashed after we selected champs and started. Game no longer works, nor let me connect to normals, aram, custom or any game mode and doesn't even connect to chat neither. What is wrong with this, I have never had this issue. Tried disabling firewall, I don't have lolreplay, nothing works, I am repairing client right now, but it just doesn't make sense, that on 2 different computers the same thing happened at the same time in different accounts.

EDIT: The repair didn't work.

replies.body:
It sounds like an issue local to the network you're connecting from. There are a number of configurations that may be conflicting with League, however, our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) covers the most common fixes.

Let me know if you have any further issues with this.
I'll try that when I get home, and I'll reply with the outcome, thanks.
